mapper.insert: insert into options (num, productNum, type, grind, price, discountRate, stock) values (options_seq.nextval, #{productNum}, #{type}, #{grind}, #{price}, #{discountRate}, #{stock})
mapper.update: update options set type=#{type}, grind=#{grind}, price=#{price}, discountRate=#{discountRate}, stock=#{stock} where num=#{num}
